name: star
description: Quantum cryptography does not work on Chuck Norris. When something is being observed by Chuck it stays in the same state until he's finished.

name: planet
description: Chuck Norris went out of an infinite loop.

name: nebula
description: Chuck Norris can access private methods.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris' keyboard doesn't have a F1 key, the computer asks him for help.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris can write multi-threaded applications with a single thread.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris doesn't need a debugger, he just stares down the bug until the code confesses.

name: planet
description: Chuck Norris can instantiate an abstract class.

name: planet
description: Chuck Norris doesn't program with a keyboard. He stares the computer down until it does what he wants.

name: nebula
description: Chuck Norris can use GOTO as much as he wants to. Telling him otherwise is considered harmful.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris doesn't use web standards as the web will conform to him.

name: nebula
description: Chuck Norris' addition operator doesn't commute; it teleports to where he needs it to be.

name: nebula
description: Project managers never ask Chuck Norris for estimations... ever.

name: planet
description: The programs that Chuck Norris writes don't have version numbers because he only writes them once. If a user reports a bug or has a feature request they don't live to see the sun set.

name: planet
description: Chuck Norris can spawn threads that complete before they are started.

name: galaxy
description: Chuck Norris never gets a syntax error. Instead, the language gets a DoesNotConformToChuck error.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris doesn't need to know about class factory pattern. He can instantiate interfaces.

name: star
description: Chuck Norris's beard can type 140 wpm.

name: galaxy
description: Chuck Norris doesn't believe in floating point numbers because they can't be typed on his binary keyboard.

name: nebula
description: When Chuck Norris presses Ctrl+Alt+Delete, worldwide computer restart is initiated.

name: galaxy
description: Chuck Norris does not use exceptions when programming. He has not been able to identify any of his code that is not exceptional.

name: galaxy
description: When Chuck Norris points to null, null quakes in fear.

name: planet
description: The only pattern Chuck Norris knows is God Object.

name: moon
description: When Chuck Norris gives a method an argument, the method loses.

name: planet
description: Chuck Norris doesn't pair program.

name: moon
description: Chuck Norris has root access to your system.
